items.sentence: I thought about telling Tom, and I should\'ve.
I thought that you said you didn\'t trust Tom.
Tom, can you show Mary how to use the scanner?
When I was a child, I believed in Santa Claus.
Tom and Mary are at a table in a quiet corner.
Tom and Mary are both afraid of their fathers.
Did you all not know that was going to happen?
Did you ever tell anybody about what happened?
Did you get good grades in junior high school?
Did you go to your dance class this afternoon?
